name: AzureWebAppSlotManager
description: Parse update slot settings web config and swap slots.
author: Darnell McMurrian
helpMarkDown: Replace with markdown to show in help

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: WebAppName
inputs.label: Web App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the name of an existing AzureRM Web Application.

inputs.name: ResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the AzureRM Web App specified above.

inputs.name: SlotName
inputs.label: Slot
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select an existing Slot.  This will also be used as the destination slot for swap

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when AzureWebAppSettingsUpdater is run.

inputs.name: TransformConfigFile
inputs.label: Transformation Configuration File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The transformation file used for the deployment slot.

inputs.name: SwapSlots
inputs.label: Enable Slots Swaps
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check this box if you want to swap the slots

inputs.name: SourceSlotName
inputs.label: Source Slot Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: This slot will be used that the source slot to use for swapping.
